title: To Save Downtowns, Destroy Them
description: Remote work revealed that core areas of San Francisco and other cities are overreliant on offices. It’s time to reimagine what—and who—downtowns are for.

title: I Finally Bought a ChatGPT Plus Subscription—and It’s Worth It
description: OpenAI’s new web browsing beta convinced me to upgrade my account. Here’s how to access it and make the most of the paid tier.

title: France Is Fighting to Save Your iPhone From an Early Death
description: With iPhones getting harder and more expensive to repair, French prosecutors have launched an investigation into the scourge of planned obsolescence.
